Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters

Interface GlobalRepeater

All Superinterfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, Repeater, Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMap, BaseStringMap, CacheMap, ConcurrentObjectMap, CountMap, LinkedMap, MultiMap, MultiSet, ObjectMap, StringMap, VariableMap
public interface GlobalRepeater extends Repeater
Broadcasts messages to the global listener

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      default void addListener(Listener listener, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.comparison.Filter<com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmittable> filter)
      Description copied from interface: Broadcaster
      Adds a listener to this broadcaster that wants to receive future messages. This is the mirror method of Listener.listenTo(Broadcaster) as both methods achieve the same thing.

      Note: adding the same listener two or more times will not replace the original listener. To do that, call Broadcaster.clearListeners() before calling this method

      Specified by:
      addListener in interface Broadcaster
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener to broadcast to. Implementations should ignore null listeners.
      filter - The filter to apply
